# NEIPv4Settings

**Class**

The IPv4 settings of an IP layer network tunnel.

## Declaration

```swift
class NEIPv4Settings
```

## Overview

To specify the IPv4 settings of a packet tunnel, set its [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEPacketTunnelNetworkSettings].[doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEPacketTunnelNetworkSettings/ipv4Settings] property to an instance of this class.

## Initializing IPv4 settings

- **init(addresses:subnetMasks:)**: Initializes an IPv4 settings object.

## Accessing IPv4 properties

- **addresses**: The IPv4 addresses to assign to the TUN interface.
- **subnetMasks**: The IPv4 network masks to assign to the TUN interface.
- **router**: The address of the next-hop gateway router represented as a dotted decimal string.

## Routing network traffic

- **includedRoutes**: The IPv4 network traffic that the system routes to the TUN interface.
- **excludedRoutes**: The IPv4 network traffic that the system routes to the primary physical interface, not the TUN interface.
- **NEIPv4Route**: The settings for an IPv4 route.

## Accessing network properties

- **ipv4Settings**: The tunnel IP version 4 settings.
- **ipv6Settings**: The tunnel IP version 6 settings.
- **NEIPv6Settings**: The IPv6 settings of an IP layer network tunnel.
- **tunnelOverheadBytes**: The number of bytes added to each tunneled packet for storing tunneling protocol headers.
- **mtu**: The size of the maximum trasnmission unit, in bytes.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
